solution_line_template: The fisherman earns ${red_snapper_cost} x {red_snappers_per_day} = $<<{red_snapper_cost}*{red_snappers_per_day}={earnings_red_snappers}>>{earnings_red_snappers} per day on Red snappers.
He earns ${tuna_cost} x {tunas_per_day} = $<<{tuna_cost}*{tunas_per_day}={earnings_tunas}>>{earnings_tunas} per day on Tunas.
Therefore, the total amount he earns is ${earnings_red_snappers} + ${earnings_tunas} = $<<{earnings_red_snappers}+{earnings_tunas}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
